TopicTitle: Notepad++ language file for KSP part config file

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

this is a language file I've start a while ago and it may be good to share over and over while some people add new stuff and features to it and share it back.

==> download <==

License: Whatever License 1.1

Installation: in notepad++, language -> define your language -> import .

At least for now it support comments on multiple lines at once (one of the only feature I really need myself), syntax colours not defined, I don't use it and don't like it.

I have also add some keywords but I'm not sure yet if it's actually useful or not, I've tried auto-completion but it doesn't work :/.

Have fun.

Edited September 28, 2014 by Justin Kerbice
file's extension fixed
My Notepad++ can only seem to import UDL's as .xml and not .udl.

My Notepad++ can only seem to import UDL's as .xml and not .udl.

I ran into the same thing (Notepad++ v.6.6.8) but renaming the extension to .xml worked, and it loaded just fine.
I have the 6.6.9, but I have messed-up somewhere, despite notepad++ use UDL, it's XML format & extension. I'll update the file.
Hey the DL link doesn't work.
